summary:
Silencio - Over 200,000 people worldwide are using the Silencio app to monitor noise pollution from their phones.

 ELOOP - ELOOP have already tokenized Austria's largest fleet (100+) of car-sharing Teslas.

 Farmsent - 160,000+ farmers in Asia and South America are already leveraging Farmsent to gain more control over their produce and its distribution.

 NATIX - Drivers running NATIX's street-mapping app have mapped over 20 million kilometres - and counting.
